smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (response ?: volleyError?.getShortcutResponse()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: response ?: volleyError?.getShortcutResponse()
Parentheses in ((findMax(variable) - findMin(variable)) / findStep(variable)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (findMax(variable) - findMin(variable)) / findStep(variable)
Parentheses in (internalData[KEY_PATTERN]?.toIntOrNull()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: internalData[KEY_PATTERN]?.toIntOrNull()
Parentheses in (internalData[KEY_WAIT_FOR_COMPLETION]?.toBoolean()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: internalData[KEY_WAIT_FOR_COMPLETION]?.toBoolean()
Parentheses in (tryNumber == 1 && shortcut.delay > 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: tryNumber == 1 && shortcut.delay > 0
Parentheses in (findViewById<ViewGroup>(android.R.id.content)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: findViewById<ViewGroup>(android.R.id.content)
Parentheses in (object : ListLiveData<Shortcut>() {}) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: object : ListLiveData<Shortcut>() {}

Parentheses around the lambda ({ before, after ->
                successCodeInput.insertAroundCursor(before, after)
                Variables.applyVariableFormattingToJS(successCodeInput.text, variablePlaceholderProvider, variablePlaceholderColor)
            }) are unnecessary and can be removed.
Parentheses in (array.length() - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: array.length() - 1
Parentheses in (versionMajor.toInt()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: versionMajor.toInt()

Parentheses in ((((versionMajor.toInt()) * 1000 + versionMinor.toInt()) * 1000 + versionPatch.toInt()) * 1000) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (((versionMajor.toInt()) * 1000 + versionMinor.toInt()) * 1000 + versionPatch.toInt()) * 1000
